FuncDef: This command configure the number of ports down along with level for multicast cac policy on this interface.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies that the number of ports available in the LAG is reduced by the number of ports configured in this command here then bandwidth allowed for bundle and/or interface will be as per the levels configured in this context. Values-1 to 64 (for 64-link LAG) 
1 to 32 (for other LAGs).
